name: Lost Boy: Lost Island
description:
Lost Boy : Lost Island exploration-focused, side-scroller action RPG packing all of the best features you've come to know and love from the Metroidvania genre into a single, An epic action adventure through a big Island. Explore caverns and battle creatures.

Play As Boy lost in island and need to look for anyone alive and his mother and need to survive.

Include in game :

Map System similar to castlevania, Upgrade Weapon, Ability tree
